title: Hiring in India’s IT industry sees a 2-3% dip due to AI, economic uncertainties
description: Artificial intelligence, economic uncertainties, and Trump’s tariffs, among other factors, have contributed to a 2–3 percent decline in India’s IT industry, with six major firms, including TCS and Infosys, hiring only 3,800 employees this quarter.
content: IT companies in India appear to be slowing down hiring as they increasingly invest in artificial intelligence, which is seen as the future of technology. This trend is expected to persist in the near term. Many are attributing this decline, which is ... [2213 chars]

title: Parliament panel urges govt to develop legal, tech solutions to act against those behind AI-based fake news
description: A parliamentary panel urges the government to create laws and tech to fight fake news made by Artificial Intelligence. The committee wants ministries to work together. They suggest licensing AI content creators and labeling AI content. The panel sees fake news as a threat. It wants stricter rules and fines. Media groups should have fact-checking and ombudsman, says the committee.
content:

title: OpenAI Partners With ARISE To Empower Indian Educators With AI Tools
description: The Masterclass, delivered by OpenAI, offered practical demonstrations of how artificial intelligence can support teachers in lesson planning, improve student engagement, and personalize learning experiences. It highlighted the potential of AI not as a replacement for educators, but as a powerful ally in strengthening the teacher-learner relationship.
content:
New Delhi: Artificial Intelligence giant OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, has collaborated with the Association for Reinventing School Education (ARISE) to bring advanced artificial intelligence tools and training to K-12 educators across India.
A... [2778 chars]

title: Spotted: ChatGPT comes to India
description: Last month, artificial intelligence’s hottest name OpenAI began posting job openings in India and announced it will run an office in New Delhi. Now, it has discreetly launched an outdoor campaign with ads showcasing all that ChatGPT can do.
content: So, it was surprising to see this week a discreet-looking analogue ad for ChatGPT, the app probably most synonymous with all the wonders of generative AI, sitting on one billboard in the corner next to Juhu Circle bus stand. This ad campaign, and oth... [1299 chars]

title: uTrade Bridges Traditional Finance and Decentralized Trading With Comprehensive Web3 Platform
description: uTrade has unveiled a comprehensive Web3 financial trading ecosystem designed to bridge the gap between traditional finance and decentralized trading. The platform integrates artificial intelligence (AI), copy trading, non-fungible tokens (NFTs), staking, and decentralized finance (DeFi) into a single framework. The initiative seeks to equip both new and experienced investors with tools that combine institutional-grade trading strategies […]

title: How ChatGPT is becoming everyone’s BFF and why that’s dangerous
description: Artificial Intelligence is changing the way we work, and it’s also changing the way we socialise. An increasing number of people are choosing AI-powered chatbots such as ChatGPT as their companions. This comes amid the growing loneliness pandemic and social media being flooded with influencers advocating the benefits of bot besties. But experts don’t agree
content:
Imagine if you had a friend who never disagreed with you. A friend who never told you that you are wrong. Who is available to talk to you at any given time of the day. And even lets you dominate the conversation.
While this may sound impossible, tech... [5460 chars]

title: AI in healthcare education: The future of learning explained
description: Artificial Intelligence is revolutionising healthcare education by making training more immersive and personalised. This transformation promises better-prepared clinicians with improved skills and empathetic patient care.
